title: Heart Surgery Residents Ready to Save Real Lives After 'Out of Body' Training Experience

title_detail.value: Heart Surgery Residents Ready to Save Real Lives After 'Out of Body' Training Experience

summary: Simulation training for surgery residents builds confidence and could have a life-saving impact on patients undergoing cardiac surgery, according to new research.
